page.title: 19AN APPRENTICES LIFE
page.content: As a 3rd year mechanical engineering technician apprentice at British Gypsum,Kirby Thore,I spend 4 days each week in the works and 1 day at Carlisle technical College doing engineering theory.The apprenticeship lasts for 4 years,and leads towards a higher T.E.C. Certificate.During this time ,I will have worked in most sections of the works , learning about the different kinds of machinery.At this stage in my apprenticeship,I do many jobs without supervision,working with trained fitters on others.One afternoon weekly is spent in the apprentice training centre where apprentices write up the jobs they have done in special books.I work from 08:00 until 16:30 with \hr for lunch although a short period of the apprenticeship is spent on an 8hr,3 shift system.
